content: आत्मना {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (<ab>instr.</ab> of आत्मन्) Used reflexively; अथ चारतमिता त्वमात्मना <ls>R. 8. 51</ls> thou thyself; आत्मना शुकनासमादाय <ls>K. 293.</ls> It is <ab>oft.</ab> compounded with ordinal numerals; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} °द्वितीयः second including himself, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} himself and one more; so °तृतीयः himself with two others &c.
